name: Pho co Hoi An
description: Pho co Hoi An is a famous restaurant in Hoi An, Vietnam. It is located in the ancient town of Hoi An, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The restaurant is known for its delicious pho, a traditional Vietnamese noodle soup. The broth is made from beef bones and spices, and the noodles are made from rice flour. The restaurant also serves other Vietnamese dishes, such as spring rolls and banh mi sandwiches. Pho co Hoi An is a popular destination for tourists and locals alike, and it is a must-visit for anyone traveling to Hoi An.

name: My Khe Beach
description: My Khe Beach is a beautiful beach in Da Nang, Vietnam. It is known for its white sandy beaches, clear blue waters, and gentle waves. The beach is popular with tourists and locals alike, and it is a great place to relax and enjoy the sun. My Khe Beach is also a popular destination for water sports, such as surfing, swimming, and jet skiing. The beach is lined with restaurants, cafes, and bars, where visitors can enjoy a meal or a drink while taking in the stunning views of the beach and the ocean.
